text: Lady with the Light Gloves () is a 1942 Danish drama movie directed by Benjamin Christensen and starring Lily Weiding, Hans-Henrik Krause, Tavs Neiiendam, Paul Rohde, Karl Jørgensen, Jessie Rindom, Olaf Ussing, Holger Strøm. ==Other websites== * Category:1942 drama movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Benjamin Christensen
title: Lady with the Light Gloves
